sources.title: Nurse.Sherri.1978.720p.Blu Ray.x264-X0r
sources.description: A hospital nurse is possessed by an evil spirit, and proceeds to kill off the hospital's patients. The film is also known under such titles as The Possession of Nurse Sherri and Black Voodoo , as well as Beyond the Living , Hospital of Terror , Killer's Curse , and Hands of Death .
